text: brasenbae kmean kroh m h nd reay thleak mk leu puokke daoy sar te tongveu robsa puokke ban sang kanlongomk haey puokke niyeay tha ao mcheasa robsa puok yeung. hetoaveibeanchea trong minban banhchoun anakneasar mneak mk aoy puok yeung daembi aoy puok yeung anouvotd tam ayeat robsa trong ning daembi aoy puok yeung klaycha anak del mean chomnue te noh ( yeung pitchea min tengtang anakchea anakneasar laey)
